entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudListProducts, ApiCrudListProducts #48608
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper, plainTextNoParamsEmptyFilter #48607
  • WebHostOptions default ShutdownTimeout does not match HostOptions default ShutdownTimeout #48605
  • Blazor Server app with many requests make website unstable #48602
  • Blazor Server DelegateHandler does not receive correct (circuit-)scoped service instance #48601

Closed

  • Perf improvement: fortunes_ef #48603
  • Perf improvement: plaintext #48591
  • Perf regression: fortunes_ef #48598

PullRequests

Created

  • Update WebHostOptions.ShutdownTimeout to 30 seconds #48606
    area-runtime, community-contribution, area-hosting

Updated

  • [Blazor] Take cascading parameter attribute type into account when supplying cascading values #48554
    area-blazor
  • Testing updated install scripts #47951
    area-infrastructure, area-commandlinetools, * NO MERGE *, stale, pr: pending author input, pending-ci-rerun
  • Issue #45096 Toru_Watanbe #48352
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pr: pending author input, pending-ci-rerun
  • Expose SNI hostname in ITlsHandshakeFeature #48572
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • [Blazor] Support for primitive types in [SupplyParameterFromForm] #48432
    area-blazor
  • Update RDG to use interceptors feature #48555
    feature-rdg, area-minimal
